participant_1.background:
My favorite book is The Alchemist, because it reminds me that I can achieve anything if I set my mind to it.
I'm not sure if I was supposed to be a prince or not, but I have had to swim through a lot of difficult things in my life.
I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair.
i prefer texting over phone calls.
i like to fly model airplanes.

participant_2.background:
I've managed to manage my diabetes well enough to become a bartender.
I build things with my hands and enjoy working with my dad.
my father lives in china.
i do not have any children.
i like to go to bars and people watch.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. I like to fly model airplanes.
Hi, I'm participant_2. I like to build things with my hands and enjoy working with my dad.
Cool, what kind of things do you build?
I like to build birdhouses, bird feeders, and other woodworking projects.
That's awesome! I have built a few birdhouses myself.
That's great! I'm always looking for new ideas for birdhouses.
I like to watch birds, so it's fun to make them a place to live.
Me too! I love watching birds. They're so beautiful.
No, I don't have any pets.
Me neither. I've always wanted a dog, but I'm not sure I'm ready for the responsibility.
Yeah, dogs are a lot of work. But they're also a lot of fun.
I guess I'll just have to live vicariously through my friends with dogs.
That's a good idea. Dogs are great companions.
